summary: Decentralized Learning Certificate Marketplace where students earn blockchain-based skill badges; includes Skill NFTs, employer verification, and a portfolio wallet.
architectural_notes: Use blockchain to store/verify skill badge ownership and authenticity (Skill NFTs).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal app mark/logo, academic + blockchain motif, flat vector style (app-mark.dim_512x512.png)
- Set of 6 flat vector badge icons (e.g., chip, network, database, shield, brain, code) with consistent style and transparent background (badge-icons-set.dim_1024x1024.png)
- Single generic badge card background texture/pattern, subtle, warm neutral palette (badge-card-bg.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and role-aware navigation for two user types: Students (who earn/manage skill badges) and Employers (who verify student badges).

Build the Student Portfolio Wallet UI that allows a signed-in student to view, filter, and open details for their skill badges, and to share a verification link or code that employers can use to verify authenticity.

Implement Employer Verification flow: a public/employer-accessible page where an employer can input a badge id (or open a shared link) and retrieve verification results from the canister, including whether the badge exists, its issuer, owner, and issuance timestamp.
Add a simple admin/issuer UI (accessible only to authorized issuers) to mint a skill badge to a specified student Principal, including form validation and success/error feedback.

Apply a coherent visual theme for the app (distinct style, consistent typography, spacing, and components) appropriate for an education + credential marketplace; avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
Generate and include static image assets for badge visuals and a simple app mark, store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them in the UI (e.g., badge thumbnails and app header).

new_feature_requests.summary: Implement Skill NFTs to represent student-earned skill badges stored on blockchain
Employer verification flow to validate authenticity of student skill certificates/NFTs
Portfolio wallet for students to view/manage/share their skill NFTs and credentials

Create backend data model and stable storage for on-chain skill badges ("Skill NFTs") issued to students, including: badge id, owner (Principal), skill name, issuer Principal, issue timestamp, optional metadata (description, level), and a verification status derived from stored data.

Add backend methods to issue (mint) a new skill badge to a student and to manage issuer permissions (who is allowed to mint), with safe defaults suitable for an MVP (e.g., canister controller/admin is initial issuer).
